item.title: tmux Status Bar
item.description: To see the currently active tmux status bar configuration, call: $ tmux show-options -g | grep status Change on of those values with in the current tmux session: $ tmux set-option status-right "" Persist the change in your tmux.conf like this: # disable right side of status bar set-option -g status-right ""
